is a municipality of Coimbatore district. It is situated at the foot hills of Nilgiris on the bank river Bhavani on Coimbatore-Guddalor State Highways. Mettupalayam Municipality was formed in the year 1948. Subsequently, Mettupalayam Municipality has been upgraded as Ist Grade Municipality from 1.4.1978.
Coimbatore Road, Sathy Road, Ooty Road, Annur Road are the 4 major highway roads connecting Mettupalayam.
Mettupalayam Railway Station Connects Coimbatore and Udhagamandalam. The two major trains connecting Mettupaalayam are

value: Mettupalayam to Chennai Central - Nilgiri Express Train (Via Coimbatore, Erode, Salem)
Mettupalayam to Ooty - Hill Train (Via Coonoor)

Coimbatore civil aerodeme or coimbatore airport (CJB). Coimbatore Airport is about 45 Kms from Mettupalayam.

value: This theme park is the main place of interest. It is in the ooty main road, 4 km from mettupalayam central.
Arulmighu Vana Bhadrakaliamman Temple is situated at thekampatti village, 5 km from mettuplalyam central.
